TopicTitle: Your thoughts on Steam VR headset?

Articles.Content:
i wanted to hear your thoughts about the new Valve's VR headset named [Vive](http://www.pcgamer.com/valves-vr-headset-is-named-vive-and-htc-are-making-it/)? 

> 
> boasts two 1200x1080 displays that refresh at 90 frames per second

a new Oculus killer has just arrived

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-03T11:01:59Z" title="03/03/2015 11:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 3, 2015</time> by Abdu**
That looks awesome!....but expensive... I sooo want to play KSP with that on.

> 
> That looks awesome!....but expensive... I sooo want to play KSP with that on.

no price yet, its valve they got so much money they won't make it cost that high

I don't care who makes the first commercial VR headset, I'll buy it from anyone! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Space Engine, anyone?

Okay, maybe it'll take a while to get *that* much money.
I'm just glad that there is more competition in the market, a monopoly on anything is a bad thing from the consumer sense. But honestly I'm more excited for Microsofts AR headset.
